content: First of all why should you buy from me?I have over 3 years of experience in Clash of clans marketMy accounts are all highly secured and from original ownerMy accounts have changeable emailsmost of my accounts come with 7d warrantyMy Stock gets updated daily, I have over 4000 Accounts in StockI am the Cheapest seller on site prices from 5-300$Welcome to the cheapest shop on siteTh15Maxed out ?$Semi Max 150$+Rushed 40$Th14Maxed out  180-190$Semi Max 120$Rushed 30-40$Th13Maxed out 120-140$Semi Max 50-60$Rushed 20-30$Th12Maxed out -$Semi Max 30$Rushed 20$Th11Maxed out 30-40$Rushed 10$Th10Maxed out 10-30$For less Townhalls or special accounts contact me Contact me on cord telegram or here for images and more infoTelegram: @vilely Discord: vilely#5984MM acceptedI’m not responsible to what happens with the account after it leaves my handsDon’t contact Supercell in any way
